Package us.avn.ws

Class AcuRite

  • java.lang.Object
    • us.avn.ws.WeatherStation
      • us.avn.ws.WsCSV
        • us.avn.ws.AcuRite
  • public class AcuRite
extends WsCSV
    Class: AcuRite Description: Specific type of CSV WeatherStation. Provides access to the current (last) values of a weather station output in a CSV file. The "csvConditionNames" provide the offsets into the parameters on the line. time - 0 (local time!) temperature - 1 barometric pressure - 6 wind speed - 8 wind direction - 11 precipitation - 7 Note: the precipitation value for the AcuRite weather station increases continuously through a "rain event". Once it has stopped for some period of time, it resets to zero.
    Author:
    Allan

      • AcuRite

        public AcuRite()
        Create a WeatherStation object as an ACU, w/a location of 1
        See Also:
        A "location" of "1" will likely not return any useful values and will need to be reset to a useful file location.
